name: GroWhaos
description:
It is suggested to play in standalone. Play in the browser might have lagging issues.

Control:

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Player Rotation

E: Grab Object

Right Mouse Button: Hold to throw

Tutorial

1, Move by pressing WASD

2, Rotate by mouse position

3, Face to ANY object that is smaller than you, and it would be shown in red outline.

 

4, Press E to grab the outlined object

5, Press & Hold the right mouse button to throw

6, More you throw, Bigger you grow, More Chaotic to crash yourself into buildings!

Credit:
